title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 606 - Articles Of Organization-faculty Council Of Community Colleges
content:

§ 606.8 - Vice president/treasurer: election, duties and term

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 606

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 355[1][c], 6304, 6305, 6306

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
